item.title: Optimising Digital Twin Laboratories with Conversational AIs: Enhancing Immersive Training and Simulation through Virtual Reality
item.description:
Mae Taylor, Zaid Muwaffak, Matthew R. Penny, Blanka R. Szulc, Steven R. Brown, Andy Merritt, Stephen T. Hilton, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4406335943
Digital twin laboratories, accessible through low-cost, portable virtual reality (VR) headsets, have become a powerful tool in chemical education and research collaboration. These immersive digital environments replicate physical laboratories, offering...
item.author: Mae Taylor, Zaid Muwaffak, Matthew R. Penny, Blanka R. Szulc, Steven R. Brown, Andy Merritt, Stephen T. Hilton

item.title: A multi-robot-multi-task scheduling system for autonomous chemistry laboratories
item.description:
Junyi Zhou, Man Luo, Linjiang Chen, Qing Zhu, Shan Jiang, Fei Zhang, Weiwei Shang, Jun Jiang, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4406371854
We present a multi-robot-multi-task scheduling system designed for autonomous chemistry laboratories to enhance the efficiency of executing complex chemical experiments. Building on the herein formulated and developed scheduling algorithms and...
item.author: Junyi Zhou, Man Luo, Linjiang Chen, Qing Zhu, Shan Jiang, Fei Zhang, Weiwei Shang, Jun Jiang
